data.lyric:
[ti:Merry Christmas]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/Elton John]
[al:Merry Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Merry Christmas - Ed Sheeran (艾德·希兰)/Elton John (艾尔顿·约翰)
[00:00.59]Composed by：Ed Sheeran/Elton John
[00:01.19]Build a fire and gather 'round the tree
[00:05.00]
[00:06.12]Fill a glass and maybe come and sing with me
[00:12.68]
[00:30.69]So kiss me under the mistletoe
[00:33.12]
[00:33.69]Pour out the wine let's toast and pray for December snow
[00:37.51]I know there's been pain this year but it's time to let it go
[00:41.86]Next year you never know
[00:43.62]
[00:44.27]But for now Merry Christmas
[00:47.03]We'll dance in the kitchen while embers glow
[00:50.33]We've both known love but this love we got is the best of all
[00:54.34]I wish you could see it through my eyes then you would know
[00:58.53]My God you look beautiful right now
[01:02.15]Merry Christmas
[01:03.70]
[01:04.41]The fire is raging on
[01:06.43]
[01:07.50]And we'll all sing along to the song
[01:10.61]
[01:12.70]Just having so much fun
[01:14.85]
[01:15.88]While we're here can we all spare a thought
[01:19.01]For the ones who have gone
[01:21.14]
[01:22.26]Merry Christmas everyone
[01:25.66]Ah ah ah ah
[01:28.26]
[01:29.84]Ah ah ah ah
[01:32.84]So just keep kissing me under the mistletoe
[01:36.20]
[01:36.82]Pour out the wine let's toast and pray for December snow
[01:40.75]I know there's been pain this year
[01:42.70]But it's time to let it go
[01:45.08]Next year you never know
[01:46.76]
[01:47.50]But for now Merry Christmas
[01:50.23]We'll dance in the kitchen while embers glow
[01:53.00]
[01:53.52]We've both known love
[01:54.75]But this love we got is the best of all
[01:57.64]I wish you could see it through my eyes
[02:00.28]Then you would know
[02:01.67]My God you look beautiful right now
[02:05.33]Merry Christmas
[02:06.85]
[02:07.39]I feel it when it comes
[02:09.54]
[02:10.60]Every year helping us carry on
[02:13.78]
[02:15.81]Filled up with so much love
[02:17.85]
[02:18.96]All the family and friends are together
[02:22.54]Where we all belong
[02:24.39]
[02:25.44]Merry Christmas everyone
[02:28.42]
[02:28.93]Ah ah ah ah
[02:30.88]
[02:32.99]Ah ah ah ah
[02:35.48]
[02:37.11]Ah ah ah ah
[02:39.75]
[02:41.34]Ah ah ah ah
[02:44.02]
[02:45.00]It's Christmas time for you and I
[02:48.68]We'll have a good night and a Merry Christmas
[02:53.49]It's Christmas time for you and I
[02:57.11]We'll have a good night and a Merry Christmas
[03:01.81]It's Christmas time for you and I
[03:05.54]We'll have a good night and a Merry Christmas
[03:10.23]It's Christmas time for you and I
[03:13.75]We'll have a good night and a Merry Christmastime
data.trans:
[ti:Merry Christmas]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/Elton John]
[al:Merry Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.59]//
[00:01.19]点燃壁炉 围绕着圣诞树
[00:05.00]
[00:06.12]斟满酒杯 或许与我高歌一曲
[00:12.68]
[00:30.69]在槲寄生下吻我吧
[00:33.12]
[00:33.69]满上红酒让我们举杯庆贺 祈祷十二月的雪飘落
[00:37.51]我知道今年实属不易 但是时候把一切放下
[00:41.86]未来不可预知
[00:43.62]
[00:44.27]但此刻请庆祝圣诞到来
[00:47.03]当壁炉火光跳动 我们在厨房翩翩起舞
[00:50.33]我们都了解爱 但我们所拥有的爱无与伦比
[00:54.34]我希望你能够从我眼里看出 你会知晓
[00:58.53]我的天呐 此刻的你美丽动人
[01:02.15]圣诞快乐
[01:03.70]
[01:04.41]熊熊燃烧
[01:06.43]
[01:07.50]我们伴着音乐歌唱
[01:10.61]
[01:12.70]尽享欢乐
[01:14.85]
[01:15.88]正值此刻 我们能否想想
[01:19.01]不在此处的人
[01:21.14]
[01:22.26]祝所有人圣诞快乐
[01:25.66]//
[01:28.26]
[01:29.84]//
[01:32.84]在槲寄生下吻我吧
[01:36.20]
[01:36.82]满上红酒让我们举杯庆贺 祈祷十二月的雪飘落
[01:40.75]我知道的 今年实属不易 
[01:42.70]但该是时候把一切放下
[01:45.08]未来不可预知
[01:46.76]
[01:47.50]但此刻请庆祝圣诞到来
[01:50.23]当壁炉火光跳动 我们在厨房翩翩起舞
[01:53.00]
[01:53.52]我们都了解爱 
[01:54.75]但我们所拥有的爱无与伦比
[01:57.64]我希望你能够从我眼里看出 
[02:00.28]你会知晓
[02:01.67]我的天呐 此刻的你美丽动人
[02:05.33]圣诞快乐
[02:06.85]
[02:07.39]当圣诞来临 我能感觉到
[02:09.54]
[02:10.60]圣诞精神助我们前行着
[02:13.78]
[02:15.81]空气中弥漫着爱的气息
[02:17.85]
[02:18.96]亲朋好友共聚一堂
[02:22.54]在我们的归属
[02:24.39]
[02:25.44]祝所有人圣诞快乐
[02:28.42]
[02:28.93]//
[02:30.88]
[02:32.99]//
[02:35.48]
[02:37.11]//
[02:39.75]
[02:41.34]//
[02:44.02]
[02:45.00]圣诞时光 只属于我和你
[02:48.68]我们将会共度良宵 共度欢欣圣诞
